tests.name: error-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: basic error with message
error "something went wrong"
tests.stderr:
something went wrong
    while executing
"error "something went wrong""
    (file "spec/tests/error/error-1.1.tcl" line 2)

tests.name: error-1.2
tests.script:
# Test: error with custom info
error "file not found" "in procedure open_file"

tests.name: error-1.3
tests.script:
# Test: error with code
error "permission denied" "" {POSIX EACCES}
tests.stderr:
permission denied
    while executing
"error "permission denied" "" {POSIX EACCES}"
    (file "spec/tests/error/error-1.3.tcl" line 2)

tests.name: error-1.4
error-1.5
tests.script:
# Test: error with variable interpolation
set msg "invalid value"
error $msg

tests.name: error-2.1
tests.script:
# Test: error caught by catch
set result [catch {error "test error"} msg]
puts "result: $result"
puts "msg: $msg"

tests.name: error-2.2
tests.script:
# Test: error with all three arguments
catch {error "test message" "custom info" {CUSTOM CODE}} msg
puts "msg: $msg"

tests.name: error-2.3
tests.script:
# Test: empty error message
catch {error ""} msg
puts "msg: '$msg'"

tests.name: error-2.4
error-2.5
error-2.6
error-2.7
tests.script:
# Test: error with special characters in message
catch {error "error with \{braces\} and \$dollar"} msg
puts "msg: $msg"

tests.name: error-2.8
